FuncDef:
The mtu check enable command enables MTU check.
The undo mtu check enable command disables MTU check. The mtu check enable command enables MTU check. The undo mtu check enable command disables MTU check. By default, MTU check is disabled for a GRE tunnel. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
